description: In this course, you will walk through a step by step guide to taking existing raw vocal recordings that have been captured in conditions, that might not be ideal, and use corrective measures to enhance the sonic playback of them. As you work your way through this course focused on getting the best from a raw, unprocessed vocal recording, you'll discover quite a few different professional techniques that, as you progress, combine so, that at the end, you have optimised the raw vocal performance and made it ready to be imported into a digital audio workstation as a complete professional vocal recording, Once you have optimised the raw vocal performance, you will be in a better position to start utilising it as the main lead vocal performance that drives your song.
title: Optimising Vocal Recordings
